description: Anime Studio documents are used for creating 2D and 3D anime videos. They can be exported to .AVI and .SWF formats, and can be uploaded to YouTube and Facebook. ANME files may also be used for saving and distributing character packs.
The ANME file was also replaced by the .ANIME file to store projects. However, ANME files are still supported by Anime Studio.
NOTE: Anime Studio was renamed Moho with the release of version 12.
